list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an agreement between two or more parties as to what each party will do for the other.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the extraconstitutional bargain between the northern elite and the southern planters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cuộc hống hề ngoại ngạch giữa giới thượng lưu phía bắc và những người trồng trọt phía Nam

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing bought or offered for sale more cheaply than is usual or expected.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the secondhand table was a real bargain
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bàn cũ là một món hời thực sự

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: negotiate the terms and conditions of a transaction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he bargained with the city council to rent the stadium
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông mặc cả với hội đồng thành phố để thuê sân vận động
